channel.title: CVE Feed for Zabbix -- Zabbix
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zabbix -- Zabbix

item.title: CVE-2023-29452|2024-10-22T16:23:20.957Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: Currently, geomap configuration (Administration -> General -> Geographical maps) allows using HTML in the field “Attribution text” when selected “Other” Tile provider.

item.title: CVE-2023-29458|2024-10-22T16:22:56.866Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: Duktape is an 3rd-party embeddable JavaScript engine, with a focus on portability and compact footprint. When adding too many values in valstack JavaScript will crash. This issue occurs due to bug in Duktape 2.6 which is an 3rd-party solution that we use.

item.title: CVE-2023-29451|2024-10-22T16:26:17.639Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: Specially crafted string can cause a buffer overrun in the JSON parser library leading to a crash of the Zabbix Server or a Zabbix Proxy.

item.title: CVE-2023-29456|2024-10-22T16:21:29.187Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: URL validation scheme receives input from a user and then parses it to identify its various components. The validation scheme can ensure that all URL components comply with internet standards.

item.title: CVE-2023-29449|2024-10-22T16:26:32.206Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: JavaScript preprocessing, webhooks and global scripts can cause uncontrolled CPU, memory, and disk I/O utilization. Preprocessing/webhook/global script configuration and testing are only available to Administrative roles (Admin and Superadmin). Administrative privileges should be typically granted to users who need to perform tasks that require more control over the system. The security risk is limited because not all users have this level of access.

item.title: CVE-2024-22116|2024-08-27T09:10:20.447Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: An administrator with restricted permissions can exploit the script execution functionality within the Monitoring Hosts section. The lack of default escaping for script parameters enabled this user ability to execute arbitrary code via the Ping script, thereby compromising infrastructure.

item.title: CVE-2024-22116|2024-08-13T14:56:38.417Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: An administrator with restricted permissions can exploit the script execution functionality within the Monitoring Hosts section. The lack of default escaping for script parameters enabled this user ability to execute arbitrary code via the Ping script, thereby compromising infrastructure.

item.title: CVE-2024-36460|2024-08-09T15:42:11.632Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: The front-end audit log allows viewing of unprotected plaintext passwords, where the passwords are displayed in plain text.

item.title: CVE-2024-36461|2024-08-09T15:22:00.513Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: Within Zabbix, users have the ability to directly modify memory pointers in the JavaScript engine.

item.title: CVE-2024-22121|2024-08-09T15:17:48.357Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: A non-admin user can change or remove important features within the Zabbix Agent application, thus impacting the integrity and availability of the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-22114|2024-08-09T13:31:39.639Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: User with no permission to any of the Hosts can access and view host count & other statistics through System Information Widget in Global View Dashboard.

item.title: CVE-2024-36460|2024-08-09T13:44:15.784Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: The front-end audit log allows viewing of unprotected plaintext passwords, where the passwords are displayed in plain text.

item.title: CVE-2024-36461|2024-08-09T13:48:04.941Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: Within Zabbix, users have the ability to directly modify memory pointers in the JavaScript engine.

item.title: CVE-2024-36462|2024-08-09T13:54:16.730Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption refers to a software vulnerability where a attacker or system uses excessive resources, such as CPU, memory, or network bandwidth, without proper limitations or controls. This can cause a denial-of-service (DoS) attack or degrade the performance of the affected system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22122|2024-08-09T13:17:56.611Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: Zabbix allows to configure SMS notifications. AT command injection occurs on "Zabbix Server" because there is no validation of "Number" field on Web nor on Zabbix server side. Attacker can run test of SMS providing specially crafted phone number and execute additional AT commands on modem.

item.title: CVE-2024-22116|2024-08-09T13:36:39.750Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: An administrator with restricted permissions can exploit the script execution functionality within the Monitoring Hosts section. The lack of default escaping for script parameters enabled this user ability to execute arbitrary code via the Ping script, thereby compromising infrastructure.

item.title: CVE-2024-22121|2024-08-09T13:08:21.185Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: A non-admin user can change or remove important features within the Zabbix Agent application, thus impacting the integrity and availability of the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-22123|2024-08-09T13:25:38.067Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: Setting SMS media allows to set GSM modem file. Later this file is used as Linux device. But due everything is a file for Linux, it is possible to set another file, e.g. log file and zabbix_server will try to communicate with it as modem. As a result, log file will be broken with AT commands and small part for log file content will be leaked to UI.

item.title: CVE-2024-22114|2024-08-09T10:15:26.509Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: User with no permission to any of the Hosts can access and view host count & other statistics through System Information Widget in Global View Dashboard.

item.title: CVE-2024-22116|2024-08-09T10:16:34.982Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: An administrator with restricted permissions can exploit the script execution functionality within the Monitoring Hosts section. The lack of default escaping for script parameters enabled this user ability to execute arbitrary code via the Ping script, thereby compromising infrastructure.

item.title: CVE-2024-22123|2024-08-09T10:57:08.143Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: Setting SMS media allows to set GSM modem file. Later this file is used as Linux device. But due everything is a file for Linux, it is possible to set another file, e.g. log file and zabbix_server will try to communicate with it as modem. As a result, log file will be broken with AT commands and small part for log file content will be leaked to UI.

item.title: CVE-2024-22122|2024-08-09T08:46:21.444Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: Zabbix allows to configure SMS notifications. AT command injection occurs on "Zabbix Server" because there is no validation of "Number" field on Web nor on Zabbix server side. Attacker can run test of SMS providing specially crafted phone number and execute additional AT commands on modem.

item.title: CVE-2024-22121|2024-08-09T08:34:47.392Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: A non-admin user can change or remove important features within the Zabbix Agent application, thus impacting the integrity and availability of the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-22120|2024-06-04T17:52:44.718Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: Zabbix server can perform command execution for configured scripts. After command is executed, audit entry is added to "Audit Log". Due to "clientip" field is not sanitized, it is possible to injection SQL into "clientip" and exploit time based blind SQL injection.

item.title: CVE-2024-22120|2024-08-01T22:35:34.820Z -- zabbix -- zabbix
item.description: Zabbix server can perform command execution for configured scripts. After command is executed, audit entry is added to "Audit Log". Due to "clientip" field is not sanitized, it is possible to injection SQL into "clientip" and exploit time based blind SQL injection.
